main event: A UFO sighting occurred involving a large elliptical object over Hudson River, New York City, observed on March 4, 1965.
interesting points: The object was about the size of a blimp and had a fluorescent bluish-white color., The object was observed for 5-6 minutes and appeared stationary before departing rapidly., The observer was approximately 4 city blocks away and noted that there were no discernable features or sounds., The weather conditions at the time of the observation were clear with visibility of 5-8 miles., Checks with local airports and police resulted in no other reports of the sighting.
location: New York City, New York, USA
witness description: The witness was described as a sober individual who made the observation.
